complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement MedicationRequest Resource Retrieval and Display
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down task 24 into subtasks for implementing MedicationRequest resource retrieval and display, including: 1) Creating the medication request retrieval module, 2) Implementing data processing functions, 3) Building the medication display UI components, 4) Integrating with the expandable cards UI, and 5) Adding CSS styling for medication display.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves multiple components: FHIR server querying, data processing, UI rendering, and integration with existing components. It requires understanding the FHIR MedicationRequest resource structure, implementing proper error handling, creating formatted display components, and ensuring everything integrates with the expandable cards UI. The complexity comes from handling various data formats, potential edge cases, and ensuring proper UI rendering across different scenarios.
